CLN&DRTY, The Glow Mask

Brand: CLN&DRTY

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Bentonite, Kaolin (White Clay), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Organic Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Powder, Optiphen, Lecithin
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
